attributes.action: allow everyone in higher education to recieve the ema bonus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the everyone should be entitled to the ema bonus even if they can not receive the weekly amount as it was set to make pupils keep on target and i don't know why it should only be available  to those who are currently on the ema and not to all on higher education to give them something to aim for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
